shows.title: Spirituality: When It All Falls Apart
shows.desc:
There comes a time when the old ways, the old traditions, the old theology just seem so…small…narrow. It is a time of wrestling, doubting, deconstructing, questioning. It is a needed time, but how do we transverse this desert well?

Joel McKerrow is an award-winning writer, speaker, educator, community arts worker and one of Australia’s most successful performance poets.

shows.title: Creativity And The Deep Place: How Creativity Moves Us Toward Freedom
shows.desc:
A writing workshop for poets, singer/songwriters, heck its for creatives of any type and any skill level. This workshop is where Creative Process meets self-growth.

Joel McKerrow is an award-winning writer, speaker, educator, community arts worker and one of Australia’s most successful performance poets.

shows.title: Woken Spurred
shows.desc: Lovingly created by our very own champion performance poet, Harry Baker. Woken Spurred is an institution - but one that's fun and relevant.

shows.title: Are You Awake Yet?
shows.desc:
Poetry is meant to be felt. Poetry is meant to reach into the forgotten places inside you and breathe them back into life. This is the kind of poetry Joel McKerrow brings. Poetry to wake you up.

Joel McKerrow is an award-winning writer, speaker, educator, community arts worker and one of Australia’s most successful performance poets.
